channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WSM Downloader
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WSM Downloader

item.title: CVE-2022-2367|2024-08-03T00:32:09.766Z -- unknown -- wsm%20downloader
item.description: The WSM Downloader WordPress plugin through 1.4.0 allows only specific popular websites to download images/files from, this can be bypassed due to the lack of good "link" parameter validation

item.title: CVE-2022-2357|2024-08-03T00:32:09.411Z -- unknown -- wsm%20downloader
item.description: The WSM Downloader WordPress plugin through 1.4.0 allows any visitor to use its remote file download feature to download any local files, including sensitive ones like wp-config.php.
